items.title: Postdoctoral fellow in representation learning, theoretical aspects of machine learning, and applied AI for physical sciences
items.description: Join us to push the boundaries of representation learning, theoretical machine learning, and applied AI for the physical sciences. Candidates with a strong publication record in self-supervised learning or generative modeling are especially encouraged to apply.
